Name: RunningMarty
About the game: Marty gets into other dimensions on his trusty hoverboard, trying to evade obstacles, aggressive cars out of control, flying machines utopian future, and most importantly, he is pursued by an endless stream of chaos, which turned into one big absorbing ball of chaos. Running Marty-Runner about the incredible adventures of Marty caught in different dimensions. Control Marty on a hoverboard, dodging various obstacles by jumping. You can upgrade your hoverboard for accumulated bonuses, increasing acceleration, jump height, buy protection, a gun, and even connect jet power to your hoverboard and fly through the levels, fearing flying machines in the air. Feature of game: - Increasing Complexity - Beautiful Visual style - Atmospheric music - Shop
